name: Ultimate GDC Runner (demo)
description:
OK, it' happening. Finally.

Welcome to the Game Dev Conference! (Or in short GDC). Well, you are not attending like a normal person would, no. This is the yearly ultimate GDC race! Purpose of the race is simple,  gathering donations from those, which could actually afford a ticket. The winner of the race gets a GDC ticket for free! You little fellow over there look like you are desperate for a GDC ticket, why don't you come with me?

  • Control your character with the arrow keys
  • Playtime: ~ 10 - 15min
  • This game contains voiced narration (so you should probably play with sound)

This is the result of my first ever game jam I was part of and there are so many things I've learned from this jam, but this might not be the right place to share these thoughts.

Anyways. This is a demo of a game I've called "Ultimate GDC Runner". The true purpose of the game is to make fun of the various aspects of the Game Dev Conference while using the jam topics as a reference. I didn't manage to complete the game on time, but I will further work on it and release a polished version with the whole story and reworking mechanics in the future! You can follow me on twitter for status updates.

I hope you enjoy my little fun GDC experience I've developed over the past week.
Special Thanks to Davdus for doing the voice acting and animations.
And thanks to everyone for sticking around and helping me create this fun little game.
